name: Sqli Agency
description:
Groupe SQLI was created in 1990 and is the leading French specialised ITC service company.
Its positioning as a large specialist is unique in France and allows it to propose a global offer that links an international group's industrial production ability to the expertise and flexibility of a specialist and means it can add value to the innovations of the companies it works with.
Its 2,000 employees are specialised in 3 skill areas:
Internet technologies and uses (Java/J2EE, Microsoft, Open Source…)
New SAP offer (NetWeaver, CRM…)
Business Intelligence (BO, Cognos, Open Source…)
Our quest for excellence is based on 4 fundamentals:
Operational excellence... "I master the process"
Knowing how to be... "I manage my potential"
Client relations... "I look after my clients"
Innovation... "Innovation is in my genes"
READ MORE...
